form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION, FORM 14405-0015

full_text: FORM APPROVED O.M.B. No. 1405-0015 OPTIONAL FORM 230 (English) (Rev. 6-82) DEPT. OF STATE APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION 50230-105 INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. All questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in dupli- cate, using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $25.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. 1. Family name First name Middle name IRANI FRENY HORMUSJI 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) FRENY MERWAN IRANT 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman letters not used) gon Sizrazey Saron 4. Date of birth 5. Age 6. Place of birth (Day) (Month) (Year) (City or town) (Province) (Country) 9 12 1904 84 BOMBAY BOMBAY INDIA 7. Nationality 8. Sex 9. Marital status Male Female Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated INDIAN. Including my present marriage, I have been married ONCE times. 10. Occupation 11. Present address HOUSEWIFE 9, PATEL CHAMBERS, Sr FLOOR, GUNBOW STREET FORT, BOMBAY - 400001 12. Name, address, date and place of birth of wife/husband (Give maiden name of wife) MR. HORMUSJI JAMASJI IRANI 9, PATEL CHAMBERS, GUNBOW STREET, FORT. BOMBAY 400001 Date and place of marriage 25/9/1924. BOMBAY. BOMBAY - 13/5/1898 13. Names, addresses, dates and places of birth of all children AS PER SHEET ATTACHED 14. Person(s) named in 12 and 13 who will accompany or follow 15. Final address in the United States me to the United States 1725, ESPLANADE AVE., APT#1 NONE NEW ORLEANS, LOUISIANA 70116, U.S.A 16. Person you intend to join (Give name, address, and relationship, 17. Name and address of sponsoring person or organization (If if any) different from 16) MR. RUSTAM H. IRANI, 1725 ESPLANADE AVE. NOT APPLICABLE. APT#! NEW ORLEAN'S. (SON) LOUISIANA, 70116 U.S.A. 18. Personal description 19. Marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height 160 CMS SCAR ON RIGHT WRIST BLACK feet inches (b) Color of eyes (d) Complexion 20. Purpose in going to the United States BROWN FAIR TO STAY WITH MY SON 21. Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) 22. Intended port of entry 23. Do you have a ticket to final destination? PERMANENTLY NEW YORK NOT YET PURCHASED. THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA NSN 7540-00-149-0919 Previous edition not usable
